papers.title: Internet of Things based Construction and Health Monitoring of High-pier Long-span Continuous Rigid Frame Bridge
papers.conference: 2020 International Conferences on Internet of Things (iThings) and IEEE Green Computing and Communications (GreenCom) and IEEE Cyber, Physical and Social Computing (CPSCom) and IEEE Smart Data (SmartData) and IEEE Congress on Cybermatics
papers.abstract_summary: Proposes an IoT-based integrated system for construction monitoring and health monitoring of high-pier long-span continuous rigid frame bridges, combining sensitivity analysis, sensor optimization, and cloud-based data management.
